subject: Re: [junit] Avoid System.out
msgSnippet: There are loggers in java that create the logs of text file of individual class at the specifed location. yahoo.com wrote: Hi, When we run Junit test cases, I
messageBody:
There are loggers in java that create the logs of text file of individual class at the specifed location.


yahoo.com> wrote:


Hi,
When we run Junit test cases, I want to see the output values on
the screen if the test fails. Currently we are using
System.out.println (variable) to see the value of the variable. Is
there any other way to see the values without using
System.out.println function. Appreciate your
help. Please respond.

Thanks & Regards,
Kunam
